description:
A Plugin that replaces the BLA Project Builder and brings it to IntelliJ Idea.

Feautures:

  • Creating a new ESDK Project and initializing following values:
    • Development Version
    • ESDK Version
    • App ID
    • App Name
    • Vendor ID
    • Package Name
    • Essentials Version Ranges
    • Languages
    • Connection Settings
    • fop.json
  • Editing current project values
  • Code generation
  • Class generation for:
    • Infosystems
    • Masks / Databases
    • Standalone Java Programms

    Coming soon:

    • Autocompletion of Eventhandler "field"-Annotation

    Have fun with it!

    Yonggan / André Schüle
